name: Off The Clock
description:
When an office party and a missile attack intersect, Oomla the engineer has less than a second to prevent disaster. Which, fortunately, is all the time he needs.

A short traditional point-and-click created for AdvXJam 2020.

Includes:

  • Alien invasion!
  • Workplace politics
  • Problem-solving through freezing/unfreezing time
  • Extraterrestrial nudity

How to play:

  • You only need the left mouse button.
  • Click the ground to walk.
  • Point your cursor at things. If the cursor changes and a label appears, click!
  • Move the cursor to the top of the screen to access your inventory. Select items by clicking them, then use them on other items / objects by - you guessed it - clicking again.
  • Clicking empty space (or right-clicking) deselects the item.
  • If you're stuck, you may be overlooking some smaller interactive objects. Watch out for things other characters are holding/wearing. Hunt those pixels!
